alternative_parents.description: Compounds having the nitro group, -NO2 (free valence on nitrogen), which may be attached to carbon, nitrogen (as in nitramines), or oxygen (as in nitrates), among other elements (in the absence of specification, C-nitro compounds are usually implied).
alternative_parents.name: Organic nitro compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an organonitric acid group or a derivative thereof.
alternative_parents.name: Organic nitric acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dialkyl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organic nitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as alkyl nitrates. These are organic compounds containing a nitrate that is O-linked to an alkyl group.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrate that is O-linked to an alkyl group.
direct_parent.name: Alkyl nitrates

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing the nitrate oxoanion, with the formula NO3-.
subclass.name: Organic nitrates

superclass.description: Organic compounds that contain one or more oxygen atoms.
superclass.name: Organic oxygen compounds
